properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 6:21AM PST until January 21 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...A MIXTURE OF SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN IN THE YAKIMA VALLEY AND
THE LOWER COLUMBIA BASIN OF WASHINGTON THIS MORNING...

.A Pacific front pushing across south central Washington will
bring a mixture of snow and freezing rain to the Yakima Valley and
the Lower Columbia Basin this morning. Precipitation will taper
off this afternoon with temperatures rising into the mid 30s to
mid 40s.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of
up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Yakima Valley.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING
